Key Match Events: India made 133 runs after losing 9 wickets
David Miller and Aiden Markram set the momentum for South Africa
Arshdeep Singh took 2 wickets but could not save the game
Post-Match Reflections: 'Not Good Enough': Rohit Sharma on India's defeat
'This was one of my biggest dreams': Lungi Ngidi on his award
'We have played in such conditions so conditions are not an excuse': Rohit Sharma
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match was played at Perth, Australia
Others: Virender Sehwag compared South Africa's win to the 2011 World Cup match
Temba Bavuma was the South African skipper
